article.title: Useful Links Related to the World Bank
article.summary: Get links to U.S. Government sites, Non-Governmental Associations and World Bank sites.
article.content:
Useful Links

U.S. Government Sites

  • U.S. Department of Commerce
    http://www.export.gov
  • U.S. & Foreign Commercial Service
    http://www.trade.gov/cs/
  • U.S. Federal Transit Administration International Program
    http://www.fta.dot.gov/assistance/research_4491.html

Associations and Non-Governmental Organizations

  • Alliance to Save Energy
    http://www.ase.org

World Bank Sites

  • Public Private Infrastructure Advisory Facility
    http://www.ppiaf.org
  • Information for Development Program
    http://www.infodev.org
  • Climate Investment Facility
    http://www.worldbank.org/cif
  • Energy Sector Management Assistance Program
    http://www.esmap.org
  • Private Participation in Infrastructure Database
    http://ppi.worldbank.org
  • Gender Equality as Smart Economics
    http://www.worldbank.org/gender
  • Oil, Gas, Mining and Chemicals
    http://www.worldbank.org/oil
  • Consultative Group to Assist the Poor
    http://microfinance.cgap.org/
  • Doing Business
    http://www.doingbusiness.org/

â€‹

article.seometadatadescription: Get links to U.S. Government sites, Non-Governmental Associations and World Bank sites.
article.seometadatakeyword: Government Agencies, Investments, Industries, Business Guides
